title: Time-specific lipid and gene expression responses to chilling stress in panicoid grass
content: This article comments on:Kenchanmane Raju SK, Zhang Y, Mahboub S, Ngu DW, Qiu Y, Harmon FG, Schnable JC, Roston RL. 2024. Rhythmic lipid and gene expression responses to chilling in panicoid grasses. Journal of Experimental Botany 75, https://doi.org/10.1093/jxb/erae247
siteTitle: Journal of Experimental Botany Current Issue
